nodes.text: The Numesira sector was a region of space in which the former Imperial governor Everi Chalis was present five days after fleeing the planet Sullust during the Siege of Inyusu Tor in 3 ABY. While in the sector, Chalis reflected on the events that took place during the siege and considered her options for the future.
The Numesira sector appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
